item.description: An item to create a path_trace on the colliding items under a given condition.

field.name: path_tracer.maximal_length
field.description: The maximal length of the trace (in seconds).

field.name: path_tracer.fill_color.red
field.description: The intensity of the red component of the color of the traces.

field.name: path_tracer.fill_color.green
field.description: The intensity of the green component of the color of the traces.

field.name: path_tracer.fill_color.blue
field.description: The intensity of the blue component of the color of the traces.

field.name: path_tracer.fill_color.opacity
field.description: The opacity of the color of the traces.

field.name: path_tracer.fade_out_speed
field.description: The duration of the fade out when the item is dead.

field.name: path_tracer.tail_ratio
field.description: The ratio of the size of the end of the trace relatively to its head.
